description.narrative: Through this consultancy, the Ministry of Education is undertaking a comprehensive study of its planning process including Monitoring & Evaluation of implementation of its policies and programs, and to prepare a proposal/plan for turning the current Education Management Information System (EMIS) into a state of the art, robust, and scalable system sustainable over a long period of time. The Ministry needs the service of a consultant to undertake a comprehensive study of the above initiative and develop a proposal for strengthening of the planning, monitoring and evaluation and EMIS at national and sub-national levels. The consultant has been hired by ministry of education using the off-budget funds from Danish Embassy. The purpose of the assignment was to `evolve a holistic Management Information System for the Ministry of Education on the basis of a comprehensive analytical review of the existing Education Management Information System (EMIS) and of the planning, monitoring and reporting systems of the ministry covering both national and sub-national level.
